disobedience.question: Did I use my words to belittle or mock the Church?

greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

extracted_data_phrases: through your words , actions , or decisions
oppression.question: Have you unjustly dominated or bullied others through your words, actions, or decisions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the blessings in your life, assuming them to be solely the result of your own efforts rather than acknowledging God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I secretly wished others would lose their successes, rather than rejoicing in them for myself?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others with language that was unfitting for family conversations?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and use words that offended others, showing a lack of reverence for their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking to the point where it became an excessive pleasure
to the point where it became an excessive pleasure
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking to the point where it became an excessive pleasure, leading you away from what is reasonable and just for yourself?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to excessive self - indulgence and a lack of control
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to excessive self-indulgence and a lack of control?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, thereby giving in to your attachment for pleasures?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I engaged in excessive and wasteful gambling, allowing it to take precedence over my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: to financial burdens that compromise our ability to meet essential needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked family financial stability through excessive gambling, leading to financial burdens that compromise our ability to meet essential needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: by engaging in wasteful gambling , compromising our stability and well - being
prodigality.question: Have I placed excessive financial burdens on my family by engaging in wasteful gambling, compromising our stability and well-being?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs through conversations , messages , or social media posts
through conversations , messages , or social media posts
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs through conversations, messages, or social media posts, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private affairs about others
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private affairs about others, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: despite having an opportunity to avoid it
impiety.question: Did I engage in unnecessary work on a Sunday, despite having an opportunity to avoid it?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impurity.question: Did I intentionally use practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

impurity.question: Have you used certain practices, substances, or objects to deliberately prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
